name: The Map
mission: Extract hawkish/dovish tone, forward pressure, rate path, and macro wind direction.
ai_analysis: The macro environment is complex, with Oil at $60.08 and DXY at 98.99 influencing the global economy. The 10Y Treasury Yield at 4.14% is impacting rates, while Gold at $4,212.90 is a safe-haven asset. The SP500 at 6,870.40 is near all-time highs, while TASI at 10,646.16 is positive. The TASI mood is Positive, with a forecast of continued growth. Key drivers are Oil prices, interest rates, global economic growth, geopolitical tensions, and central bank policies.
